name: scorpion - UserBot
description: An advanced Telethon userbot to protect you from scammers with extra features

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

STRING_SESSION.description: Important to activate get it from here :- https://replit.com/@loverboyXD/Scorpion-sessionstring

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: ID of your private log channel/group. IT must start from -100.......elsee wrong.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the token of your bot.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the username of your bot. Needed for .help to work.

DATABASE_NAME.description: Your database name from mongoDB. ( Default will 'Cluster0' )

ALIVE_PIC.description: telegra.ph link to theimage you want as alive pic, leave blank for sticker

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: telegra.ph link to theimage you want as pmpermit pic, leave blank for default one!
